name: Gin Rummy Extra - Card Game
description:
Play the most genuine Gin Rummy game and join millions of real players online.
Compete to win the supreme prizes in Gin Rummy Extra. Join the FREE Gin Rummy online multiplayer game that you can’t leave everywhere you go.Gin Rummy Extra – one of the most challenging card game ever like classic rummy , regal rummy etc.

Key Features of Gin Rummy Extra

** Play for FREE – Play the game fully free of charge
** Play live with Friends – Invite your friends to play Gin Rummy and make it a fun day anytime anywhere
** Get social and Get Rewarded – Play with our online community . Invite your friends and make new ones.
** Avatars - Choose from many gorgeous avatars and play at the custom table themes .** Levels – Keep on leveling up to get rewards
** Free Bonuses – Claim your free chips via Piggy Bank & Lucky Wheel
** Missions – Complete Daily rewards flightsDive in to the Action with Gin Rummy Extra .

Download and Play Now Gin Rummy Extra is free on all devices with in-app purchases . Follow Gin Rummy Extra on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses.WE’D LOVE YOUR FEEDBACK ! and don’t forget to Rate Us
